title: Red Moscato
description: I have it bad for my grumpy boss.Mr. Mavis is thirty-five.He shouldn’t be grumpier than an old man complaining about the summer heat.I witness his tender side when his daughter’s around.I’ve watched the grump from afar for years.I’m the reason he’s the way he is.As much as I want a second chance with him, I know that can’t happen.Secrets, lies, and tragedy keep us apart.
author: Shantee' A. Parks (Posey Parks)
